steps: Preheat skillet
Melt butter in skillet
Assemble bread, cheese, bread into sandwich
Place sandwich in pan
Flip sandwich after 2-3 minutes or until golden brown
Repeat for 2nd sandwich
recipes.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich

ingredients: 2 Red Bell Peppers, Seeded and Diced
4 Cans Kidney Beans with Liquid (15 oz)
1 Can Chipotle Peppers in Adobo Sauce (7 oz)
steps: Cook beef in large pot over medium heat until brown, drain
Return beef to pot and stir in onions, bell peppers and jalapenos. Cook until tender
Add garlic and cook 1 minute more
Season with chili powder, cumin, satl and pepper. Add in tomato paste and kidney beans with liquid
Puree tomatoes and chipotle peppers in food processor until smooth
Add mixture to pot with 3 cups water
Combine remaining 1 cup water with floud in a jar and shake to combine
Pour flour mixture into chili and stir in vinegar
Simmer 45 minutes and serve.
recipes.name: Chilli
Broccoli Cheddar
steps: Melt 2 tbsp butter over medium heat in a large stockpot
Saute onion until tender (5-7 minutes).
Add carrots to the pan and cook a few minutes longer.
Stir in broccoli, chicken broth, onion salt and garlic pwoder.
Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer.
Melt the remaining butter in a medium saucepan.
Add the flour and cook for 1-2 minutes until golden brown, whisking constantly.
Whisk in milk and cook until mixture thickens and bubbles (5 mins).
Wisk in cheese until completely melted.
Remove from heat and add cheese sauce to the soup pot.
Allow to simmer until warmed through and broccoli is tender.
Season with salt and freshly ground pepper to taste. Serve.

recipes.name: Buffalo Chicken Wrap
ingredients: 1 lbs skinless, boneless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces
steps: Heat vegetable oil and butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook chicken in pan until it is no longer pink in the center and juices run clear (10 minutes).
Remove the pan from the heat and pour hot sauce over cooked chicken. Toss to coat.
Lay out tortillas and divide chicken evenly.
Top chicken with lettuce, celery andblue cheese dressing.
Fold in the sides of the tortilla and roll the wrap burrito-style. Serve.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir Fry
ingredients: 1 cup water1 tsp chicken bouillon granule
steps: Cut chicken into 1/2 inch strips and place in resealable plastic bag
Add cornstarch and toss to coat
Combine soy sauce, ginger, and garlic powder and add to bag. Shake well.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Heat 2 tnsp oil in a large skillet or wok. Stirfry chicken until no longer pink (3-5 minutes). Remove and keep warm.
Add remaining oil stir fry broccoli, celery, carrots and onion fr 4-5 minutes or until crisp/tender.
Add water and bouillon and return chicken to pan. Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Serve

recipes.name: Chicken Salad
ingredients: 1 cup water1 tsp chicken bouillon granule
steps: Cut chicken into 1/2 inch strips and place in resealable plastic bag
Add cornstarch and toss to coat
Combine soy sauce, ginger, and garlic powder and add to bag. Shake well.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Heat 2 tnsp oil in a large skillet or wok. Stirfry chicken until no longer pink (3-5 minutes). Remove and keep warm.
Add remaining oil stir fry broccoli, celery, carrots and onion fr 4-5 minutes or until crisp/tender.
Add water and bouillon and return chicken to pan. Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Serve
